title: Hugr
creator: Dig Inclusion
description: Hugr is an accessibility testing framework that helps users test sites against WCAG criteria. It supports testers in identifying issues while also suggesting solutions. The core version is free to use, but there is also a business and enterprise version.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
